availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Muhlenberg County, Kentucky, resident. Georgia native. Married to Thomas Salsbury. Resident of Muhlenberg County in 1850. Owned eighteen enslaved persons in Muhlenberg County in 1850. Household owned seven additional enslaved persons in Muhlenberg County in 1850. Owned William Salsbury in Muhlenberg County in 1857.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, Subdivision 2, p. 272A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, Subdivision 2.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, District 2, p. 97B-98A.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Muhlenberg County Wills, vol. 2-3, 1814-1877, p. 86-9.
KYR-0001-020-0178.
